{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Cisco RV220W.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Cisco Wireless Network Security Firewall |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.cisco.com/en/US/products/ps11025/index.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Cisco_RV220W |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Cisco |model = RV220W |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = P27RV220W |icid = 5604A-RV220W |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CN5010; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS64 |cpu1_type_rev = OCTEON Plus |cpu1spd = 400 <!-- 300 / 400 / 500 / 600 / 700 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29GL256EHT2I-90Q; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM68B16CWQD-25H; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53115; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI |exp_minipci_num = 1
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = Octal Transparent D-Type Latch;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC373A;;1;,,, Synchronous and Rectified Buck PMW Controller;Chip Advanced Tech;CAT7580;;1;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AO4842;;1;,,, 600 mA CMOS LDO;AME Inc;AME8809;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = cisco |defaultpass = cisco |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/16/2010 |estreldate = 01/25/2011 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B004H8FSQM |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4322; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "YK910A-1.6" and the ''Cisco'' logo is silkscreened on the main board. :"YK900MOA-1.0" is silkscreened on the wireless module.
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31456-cisco-rv220w-wireless-network-security-firewall-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :CPU: [[Cavium]] [http://www.caviumnetworks.com/OCTEON-Plus_CN50XX.html CN5010] @400MHz :Broadcom BCM53115 GbE switch :128MB of RAM and 32MB of flash :Broadcom BCM4322 802.11abgn :2.4/5GHz radio (mini-PCI module)
==See also== [http://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/routers/small-business-rv-series-routers/models-comparison.html Cisco models comparison]
*Cisco RV220W Wireless Network Security Firewall :*[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31456-cisco-rv220w-wireless-network-security-firewall-reviewed Review on '''SNB'''] • [http://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/routers/rv220w-wireless-network-security-firewall/index.html PPage] • FCC ID: P27RV220W
*'''[[Cisco RV120W]]''' Wireless-N VPN Firewall :*[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31393-cisco-rv-120w-wireless-n-vpn-firewall-reviewed Review on '''SNB'''] • [http://www.cisco.com/en/US/products/ps10852/index.html PPage] • FCC ID: P27-RV120W :CPU: [[Cavium]] [http://www.caviumnetworks.com/OCTEON-Plus_CN50XX.html CN5010] @300MHz :Broadcom BCM5325 FE switch :64 MB of RAM and 16 MB of flash :Broadcom BCM4322 802.11bgn :2.4GHz radio ([http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31360-new-to-the-charts-cisco-rv-120w-wireless-n-vpn-firewall mini-PCI module])
*'''[[Cisco RV180W]]''' Wireless-N Multifunction VPN Firewall :"YYP00D-1.6" is silkscreened on the main board ([[SerComm]]). :"CK7794V-0" and "YYP00N0B-1.0" is silkscreened on Wi-Fi module. *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/security/security-reviews/31746-cisco-rv180-vpn-router-reviewed ''Cisco RV180'' review on '''SNB'''] • FCC ID: P27-RV180W :This device's board seems to be near-identical ::to the [[Cisco RV180]] (non-wireless model). :The Switch in this model is assumed to be the same. :"YYP00C-1.6" is silkscreened on the RV180 board ([[SerComm]]). :Single ''ESMT'' M14D5121632A-2.5B (64MB) RAM chip ::used despite a place on the board for another.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
